reviews.review: Is so good!
Sin palabras... Sensillamente bello *-*

Что я могу сказать про второй эпизод Half-Life.. Я в панике. Что дальше? Где же то долгожданное раскрытие событий, о которых нам говорили? Я конечно в восторге от этих дополнений серии, на высоте как всегда. И саундтреки, и сама история просто на должном уровне. Я безумно рада. 5\5, без сомнений этой игре. Даже не раздумывайте, стоит ли проходить эту историю. Конечно стоит!

Ep 2 é excelente.

Considero half life uma das melhores franquias já feitas... É uma pena que o Ep 3 provavelmente nunca vá existir, um game enigmático... muito alem de um simples FPS, um dos jogos mais envolventes que tive o prazer de jogar, acho que a Valve só não faz um Ep 3 por medo de não conseguir fazer um trabalho tão bom quanto em Hl2... Vide que Hl 2 foi considerado o game da década...

O game em si é curto e segue a linha dos anteriores é uma continuação direta sem rodeios... Porem o final é triste... deixa uma vontade de jogar o proximo... Mas não existe...  E sim já estamos a 10 anos aguardando a tal continuação.

Para alguns a continuação desse game é o jogo portal... existem muitas referencias e é evidente que os dois se passam no mesmo mundo... mas quem sabe um dia... vamos ver...

Mas horas de jugablidad que Half Life: Episodio 1, y se siente mejor la experiencia con el entorno.
9/10
So good you'll be asking for a third.

In my opinion Episode 2 is back on par with the core game of Half-Life 2 and makes a few large plot developments, giving a tantalising insight into certain enigmatic characters and groups. In the end the game leaves us with more questions than answers, though, answers that even after almost a decade have not been forthcoming. The game stands out, for me though, because of its set pieces, the amazing moments in the game that shock you, scare you or even make you totally not tear up. This and excellent gameplay is what Half-Life is all about and Episode 2 manages to rekindle this after losing it somewhat in Episode 1.

[b]Full review below if you want to check it out:[/b]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9QP1SajzHdo

^ ^ 现在是 2017 年 , << Half-Life 2: Episode Two >> 上市已过去 10 年 , 而在 " 开发者注释 " 中多次提到的 Episode 3 依然没有任何消息 , 但我永远不会放弃等待 , 因为 << Half-Life 2: Episode Two >> 留下了太多悬念 ; 北极光号 , 光圈科技 , 匆匆离去的 朱迪斯 · 莫斯曼 , 神秘的 G-Man , 伊莱 · 凡斯 有意避开 爱丽克斯 · 凡斯 单独和 戈登 · 弗里曼 说的那些话等等 , Half-Life 的故事绝对还没完 ...

Проходится игра за 4-5 часов и оставляет только прекрасные ощущения... Да и всё таки интересно было чем закончится этот шедевр. К покупке обязательна!

My favorite game in HL2, this game explored the rural side of the HL2 universe, unlike the dystopian settings of the previous game. I found the part with the car in the jungle extremely good, and the antlion's nest is quite amusing as well. The final battle with the Striders is thrilling. Sadly, the game ends with a cliffhanger, and now we're in a neverending wait for future games.

Nice but HL3 would be nicer.

Et voila, mon aventure half life s'achève avec HL2:Ep2 et honnètement, il a failli ettre mon préféré par rapport au un; En tout cas, c'est celui avec le gameplay le plus fun, il y'a plein de scequence avec de nouvelles mini gameplay que j'ai fort apprécié. L'histoire de HL2:Ep2 est beaucoup plus epique comme me l'a précisé el famoso junko et j'ai pas été décu.[spoiler]C'est le combat final, l'attaque pour detruire le portail une bonne fois pour toute, l'enjeu est très important, les BO accompagne bien ce sentiment jusqu'a la victoire[/spoiler]
Com d'hab j'ai enive de vous dire que HL2:Ep2 peauniffie les idées de ses antécédent ect, mais je préfére parler ici de half life:qu'est ce qui fait de half life une serie remarquable selon moi? Pourquoi je ferai parti de ceux qui prendront au plus vite HL/Portal 3 comme Gabe Newell l'a annoncé?
Le gameplay de la serie est d'une simplicité incroyable, les inputes etant rare: zqsd, e, clic gauche, r, la molette de la souris et defois clic droit, c'est tout pour moi perso. Cela fait de half life un jeu simple, on peut avancer, appuyer sur des bouton, tirer, recharger, changer d'arme, zommer. Mais avec si peu de commande, la serie a su nous ammener dans differentes phases de gameplay, du tir au puzzle en passant par la conduite qui necessite 2 touche de plus seulement, la gestion d'escouade ect.
L'histoire est interessante, prenante et très cool. J'en parlerai pas trop pour pas spoiler, j'aimerai juste dire que la transistion entre le 1 et le 2 est très boen menée car même si on est pas dans black mesa, on se sent directement en tant que gordon freeman avec l'intro, et ca c'est cool.
Les IA sont d'une humanité. Je vais surement exagerer sur cette partie mais ca fait du bien de se sentir proche de personnages dans un jeu sans qu'on se dise que c'est juste un bot qui execute des script. C'est car y'a aucune cinematique ou on ne fait rien, mais aussi par le background des perso, par les dialogues, l'humour... Tout fait qu'on s'attache aux perso et qu'on ne veut pas les quitter.
Les jeux (surtout les petits de 3-5h) gerent bien leur durée et leur contenu pour ne pas lasser les joueurs. J'ait fait de fin decembre a ajd tout les half life duramnt mes temps de jeux solo, et j'ai toujour voulu finir tout les half life avant de me lancer dans mes autres jeux solo et ca c'est fort.
La bande son est incroyable, melange d'electro et de rock, très bien menée et entrainante.
La difficulté est plutot bien gerée, tout comme le game design, qui nous invite très rarement a allez chercher la soluce.
Un plus pour blue shift et opposing force qui nous emmène dans la peau d'autre perso, mais toujour dans le même univers et a la même timeline que HL. J'aurais aimé une autre expansion de ce genre pour half life 2 (je critique en rien les perso de HL:Ep1&2 haibn ^^)
Bref, c'est a 100% que je vous invite a acheter le half life bundle sur steam et de vous faire comme moi tout les half life.

Oh boy, oh boy. What a game. Probably the best in the entire Half-Life series. The pace of the story is simply magnificent. I loved this game so much from start to finish. This covered every area that was lacking in Episode 1. The whole antlion nest chapters and the final chapter was probably some of the most engaging stuff I have experienced in a game.

I am glad I picked up the Half-Life series again a few months ago. Half-Life 3/Half-Life 2: Episode 3 couldn't come sooner. Now I wait.

Really good game, a lot of fun to play, i recomend this game to anyone, its an old classic

A lot of people say the original is always better then the sqeual. I have to disagree. This is a game who does it right when they say "Alright god dammit we're gonna make a second chapter of this game and where gonna do it right!". There is so much to say about this game, the massive cult following it's gain to it's various RP servers it's spun off in GMOD. It's massive amount of lore to it's amazing combat system. It's nothing but amazing! There is so much to learn, so much to enjoy, so much to love! I know I sound like I'm kissing ♥♥♥ when I say this but this game makes me love valve more than anything. Either being the same badass scientist that crawled his way out of that hell hole known as Black Mesa smashing Crowbars into the ugly guls of Alien Monsters now into the Gasmask of Metro Police Officers that opress a civilian populace under a Universal Union Banner in the name of "Civil Status". Or riding around in a scrapped sports car with a rather attractive but at the same time a TRUE strong and independant female character Alyx. You feel like a badass actually doing something for a resistance, no, a revolution for mankind being enslaved by a Alien Empire. This game is perfect. This game is art.
un poco mas largo que el anterior, mucho mas intenso y lugares abiertos donde pelear y mas detalles en los paisajes, 500% recomendado al igual que half life 2 y el episodio 1

两天玩遍了半条命所有系列，这应该是最后一部了。
爱丽克斯，她是个坚强的女孩，本部全程跟着戈登冒险，即使戈登一人在外应对三脚卫士，她也没有闲着，并改造了直升机。
戈登·弗里曼，他通过自己的行为赢得了人们自心里的尊敬和认可。无所谓英雄，只是，他是最可靠的同伴。
结尾的“倒数计时”后，本以为会有一个美好的结局，但是欧美人总没有中国这种传统的大团圆结局的心态啊。
意料之外的，爱丽克斯的父亲还是没能逃掉一劫。
结局来临，爱丽克斯的哭号声撕心裂肺。
不祥的BGM响起，随后“Half-Life 2: Episode Two”的谢幕词闪过，一切又终归于沉寂。

我想，半条命之所以被称为经典，自然有它的原因。

[h1]Half-Life 2:  Episode Two Review[/h1]
[b]by KTMboyz[/b]

[i]"Prepare for unforseen consequences...[/i]

This is how you follow up to Half life 2!  Hell ya!  Episode One was okay I guess, it was a little disapointing and short.  Now that I play Episode Two, I realize that Episode One's only purpose is to lead us into the greatness of this one.  In fact, they could have been one game, but enough about that.  Why is this the superior episode?  Half-Life 2:  Episode Two nailed the story, making it interesting and easy to follow.  It also helps that there are a few cutscenes...  But Half-Life never was about the story as much as it was about merging action and storytelling in a unique way.  Once again, valve does that right too!  Boss battles are alot better in this one, level design is fairly linear but opens up during battles for multiple ways to win.  A few new mechanics and an overall amazing, well deserved follow-up to my favourite shooter of all time!

[h1]9.8/10[/h1]

Wie bitter wäre es eigentlich, wenn wir weder Episode Three noch Half-Life 3 bekommen würden?
Während Episode One eher einen schnellen Happen im Leben von Gordon Freeman, dem Hauptcharakter der Serie, darstellt, so ist Episode Two definitiv ein feines Desert zum Abgang. 

In Sachen Leveldesign, Kreativität, Story und Herausforderung bewegt sich Episode Two auf ähnlichem Niveau wie das Hauptspiel, wenn es auch nicht ganz an die Genialität heranreicht. Was mir gut gefällt ist, dass es wieder deutlich abwechslungsreicher zur Sache geht. 
Mal bewegt man sich in düsteren und engen Tunneln, mal cruist man in einem Fahrzeug durch lineare Passagen und mal - und das ist recht neu für die Serie - bewegt man sich in einem offenen Gebiet, indem man auf verschiedene Gefahrenquellen reagieren muss. 

Episode Two bietet neue Gegner und fordert einmal mehr Kreativität beim Spieler ein und fördert den Erkundungswillen. Auch in Sachen Story bietet Episode Two richtig viel: Es werden so viele neue Fragen aufgeworfen und nur einige, wenige alte Fragen beantwortet. 

Wenn diese Erweiterung das letzte ist, was wir von Gordon Freeman sehen, hat er einen absolut würdigen, wenn auch extrem unkomplettierten Abgang. 
Wer Half-Life 2 so sehr liebte wie ich, der muss bei Episode Two zugreifen. Allerdings ist die Spielzeit doch recht kurz, was für mich der einzige Kritikpunkt an dem Spiel ist. Doch letztlich ist es Half-Life und wer spielt Half-Life schon nur einmal durch...die Games sind zeitlos und laden zu immer wieder neuen Durchläufen ein!

Episode 2 of the Half-Life franchise following up on the main story, goes in-depth with what happened after the train crashed when the explosion went off, how to save Alyx when she is attacked by a great mechanical hunter, and picking up on all loose nooses as you find your way up to Alyx´s father and the facility in which they have established. After this, the great war that will ensure that the Combine won´t enter the world with a ton of more armies. It definitely is all-round the bases. 

Again great installment, this one is a LOT more content-filled and challenging in terms of content, and you will be tested in a few new ways previously not known to Half-Life. Definitely a must regardless, especially if you have come this far. 

Have fun!

13 yıl sonra ara oyun Alyx'in gelmesi ümit verici. Bu ümitle beraber ben de seneler sonra serinin başına oturdum ve aynı heyecanla yeniden oynadım. Müthiş bir hikaye... Değişken atmosferi, karakterler ve oynanış gerçekten harika. Bu seriyi oynamayan çok şey kaçırır. Bir de [b]resmi[/b] Episode 3 gelse, Portal mekanikleriyle azıcık harmanlansa of... Oyun dünyası garanti yıkılır. Tabi kim bilir bunun için daha kaç sene bekleyeceğiz.

Ekstra: Tabi bekleme esnasında Half-Life özlemini gidermek için resmi olmayan [b]Half-Life 2: Episode 3 The Closure[/b] modunu veya [b]Black Mesa[/b] gibi başarılı bir remake'i oynamak mümkün. 
Bir de 2017'de yayınlanan hikayeyi baz alan fan-made [b]Project Borealis[/b] var. Ancak daha yapım aşamasında. The Closure'dan daha kapsamlı olacak ve Unreal 4 ile gelecek.

Unglaublich ! Nach der eher schwachen Episode 1 ist Episode 2 ein Meisterwerk ! Gerade zum Ende hin wirds echt spannend ! Wer diese 8 euro für ein Spiel nicht übrig hat, hat wirklich etwas im Leben verpasst ! Neueinsteiger empfehle ich aber mit dem Hauptspiel anzufangen !

Definitely my favorite of the Half Life episodes. This game introduces a whole bunch of new enemies, scenery and story and really adds a lot to the original game. It takes place mostly in beautiful outdoor areas too which creates a lot of unique situations.

Gordon and Alex are still together and trying to reach scientists (including Alex's father Eli) at a compound in White Forest. Alex is wounded by a Hunter and Gordon must heal her with the help of the Vortugants. They eventually make it to the compound and try to close a portal to the Combine's world with a rocket.

This episode has many bends and turns in the story and adds a lot of depth to the whole Half Life experience. There is much more here than in Episode 1 and you can tell as you play through the levels how much everything is pushed forward.

The combat sequences are just as engaging too, and the end fight is simply exhausting. You really feel like you've saved planet Earth.

Highly recommended, and it ties the whole series up very nicely (though the ending is a real cliff hanger and leaves future Episodes open for exploration)

10/10
